hero.headline: Automate Your Business Operations
hero.subheadline: AI-Powered Workflow Automation • No Code Required • 14-Day Free Trial

about.title: Work Smarter, Not Harder
about.text: CloudPeak helps growing businesses eliminate repetitive tasks and focus on what matters. Our AI-powered platform connects your existing tools and automates workflows in minutes - no coding required. From invoice processing to customer onboarding, over 5,000 companies trust CloudPeak to save 10+ hours per week. Founded in 2021 by former Google and Salesforce engineers, we're backed by top-tier VCs and growing 300% year-over-year.

services.name: Workflow Automation
services.description: Connect 300+ apps and create automated workflows with our visual drag-and-drop builder.

services.name: AI Document Processing
services.description: Extract data from invoices, contracts, and forms automatically. 99% accuracy guaranteed.

services.name: Custom Integrations
services.description: Need something specific? Our team builds custom integrations for enterprise clients.

services.name: Analytics Dashboard
services.description: Track time saved, errors prevented, and ROI with real-time analytics and reporting.

testimonials.name: Sarah K.
testimonials.content: CloudPeak automated our entire client onboarding process. What took 2 hours now takes 5 minutes.

testimonials.name: Michael R.
testimonials.content: Invoice processing that used to take my team a full day is now done automatically overnight.

testimonials.name: Lisa T.
testimonials.content: The ROI was obvious within the first month. We scaled from 100 to 1,000 orders/day without adding staff.
